about_the_game:
Get ready to experience the thrill of mowing a lawn like never before!



In Robot Lawn Mower, you will control a robotic lawn mower as it navigates through a variety of different lawn mowing scenarios. From small residential lawns to large commercial properties, you'll encounter a wide range of obstacles and challenges that will put your skills to the test.

The game features stunning 3D graphics and realistic sound effects that will make you feel like you're really out in the yard mowing the lawn. You'll need to use your strategic thinking and quick reflexes to avoid obstacles, navigate tight spaces, and get the job done efficiently.

With multiple varied levels there's always a new challenge waiting for you. Whether you're a seasoned lawn mowing pro or a newbie just starting out, this game is perfect for anyone who loves a good challenge and wants to have some fun in the virtual outdoors.

So why wait? Download Robot Lawn Mower today and start mowing your way to victory!



Features

• Real time grass cutting mechanics
• Relaxing, satisfying and calming gameplay
• Multiple levels
• Multiple robot lawn mowers to unlock
• Pets and other obstacles to avoid
• Complete challenges to unlock new robot lawn mowers
• Chilled out lofi music to mow to
• Easy to use controls
• Rebindable keys

name: Robot Lawn Mower

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista SP1+ or higher
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590, AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970, AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Robot Lawn Mower is a relaxing and satisfying robot grass cutting game
